item.description:
It's John Lennon's birthday so let's celebrate!

The West Coast Swing is danced to the Blues, Jazz, Swing, contemporary and pop hits. You do NOT need a partner and a complimentary lesson is available to anyone looking to learn the basics.

The lesson is from 7:30 - 8:30. The dance starts at 8:30. The cost is only $10.00 for the dance and $2.00 for the meet up fee.

I've heard from many that this is great fun and no dancing skills are required! Just come and have fun!

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: A John Lennon Celebration
